text: Ezɨ kɨ orazi, mati gumazimɨn tiarim bizir angamra itir 4 plan kabar tongɨn mɨgɨa, egha mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia mangɨ uan ingangarim damutɨ, eghtɨ dagheba bar otevegham. Kamaghɨn, gumazim dughiar vamɨran ivezim inigh, a witɨn mɨner muziarir vamɨra o balin mɨner muziarir 3 plara givezam. Egh ia olivɨn temeba ko wainɨn beniba gasɨghasɨghan markɨ, eghtɨ olivɨn borem ko wain ikɨvɨra ikiam.”
